newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: RESEARCH ALERT - Fraser says hold YHS.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Fraser says hold YHS.

text.p: Shares in drinks firm Yeo Hiap Seng Ltd (YHS) were given a hold recommendation on Friday by analysts at Fraser Securities Pte Ltd.

Fraser said in a note to clients it expected profits of about Singapore $110 million from a property development project would take up to three years to arrive and the firms's stock -- controlled by the Far East Organisation -- was very illiquid.
"We are forecasting net profit of S$12 million and S$25.3 million for FY1997 and 1998 respectively," the note said.
The jump in profits was expected to come primarily from The Sterling development project, the company's second private residential project in Singapore due to launch on Saturday.
"We expect the project to contribute to earnings from FY1998 and profit recognition will be over the next two to three years," the note said.
Fraser said it estimated The Sterling would deliver profits of about S$110 million after development costs of S$74 million and land costs of S$140 million.
